document.text:
From: Sigrid McCawley <smccawley@bsfllp.com> 
To: BECHIJ DCPJ 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: RE : [INTERNET] RE: FW: French Judicial Police 
Date: Thu, 21 Nov 2019 22:58:26 +0000 
Hello and =, 
During our call you explained that you were actively trying to investigate crimes in France by Jean Luc Brunel and had 
reached out to certain government officials in the US to try to coordinate your efforts but had not received any 
substantive communication or assistance. I explained that there is a great team of prosecutors in New York who have 
been actively working on this investigation. Per our call I am copying above 
M. As I explained, I am not sure if they can directly be of help to you but they will likely have a better sense of who 
within the US government you can be coordinating with. 
I hope this is helpful and thank you for your pursuit of justice in France. 
Best, 
Sigrid 
Sigrid McCawley 
Partner 
BOIES SCHILLER FLEXNER LLP 
401 E. Las Olas Blvd. Suite 1200 
Fort Lauderdale, FL, 33301 
(t) +1 954 377 4223 
(m)+1 954 770 5377 
smccawleyAbsffip.corn 
www.bsfllp.com
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, November 19, 2019 2:58 PM 
To: Sigrid McCawley <smccawley@bstilp.com>; 
Subject: RE : [INTERNET] RE: FW: French Judicial Police 
Dear Sigrid 
I'm Man Head of the unit. 
Thanks ok for us. Around 12:00. 
Talk tout you tomorrow. 
Best re ards 
Envoye dc mon Galaxy A3 Orange 
DCPJ 
Message d'origine 
EFTA00020911

De : Sigrid McCawley <smccawleyÂ®bsflIp.com>
Date : 19/11/2019 20:15 GMT+01:00 
A: 
DCPJ 
Cc: 
Objet : [INTERNET] RE: FW: French Judicial Police 
HelloIM- I will be on a flight to New York tomorrow morning at 10:00. I should arrive in New York by 11:45 so I 
could speak at 12:00 if that works for you (depending on if my flight runs on time). 
Sigrid McCawley 
Partner 
BOIES SCHILLER FLEXNER LLP 
401 E. Las Olas Blvd. Suite 1200 
Fort Lauderdale, FL, 33301 
(t) +1 954 377 4223 
(m)+1 954 770 5377

www.bsfllp.com
From: DCP1 [mailto 
Sent: Tuesday, November 19, 2019 12:14 PM 
To: Sigrid McCawley <smccawleyPbsflip.com>
Cc: 
Subject: Re: FW: French Judicial Police 
Hello 
Thank you for your rapid response. 
Would you be available to speak tomorow, at 10 am your time (so 4pm our time in France) '? 
Thank 
you, 
glop 
police nationale 
CAPITAINE DE POLICE 
Direction centrale de la police judiciaire 
Office Central pour la Repression des Valences aux Personnes 
Adpint du Groups Central des Mineurs \flames 
101 rue des Trois Fontenot - 92000 NANTERRE 
Tel: 01 40 97 84 01- Fax :01 73 92 25 55 -

N'imprimons que si necessaire. 
 Message original

Pour: 
Copie >r  :  Aneisha Christie <achristie@bsfilp.com>, Sigrid McCawley <smccawlex@bsfilp.com> 
Date :  19/11/2019 17:01 
Hello a, 
I am one of the attorneys who represents I am in receipt of your message below. Kindly let me know 
if there is a good time you would like to speak. 
EFTA00020912

Thank you for your interest in this matter. 
Best, 
Sigrid 
Sigrid McCawley

From: dawn schneider [mailto:schneidergroup14Ogmail com 
Sent: Tuesday, November 19, 2019 6:52 AM 
To: Sigrid McCawley <smccawleyabsfIlp.com>
Subject: Fwd: French Judicial Police 
This one is 
for you. 
Sent from my iPhone 
Begin forwarded message: 
From: 
DCPJ 
Date: November 19, 2019 at 6:07:04 AM EST 
To: schneider  rou 14 mail.com 
Cc: 
Subject: French Judicial Police 
Hello, 
My name is and I am the deputy of the Central Unit for the protection of Minors in France 
(OCRVP). 
My unit is in charge of the french side of the Epstein/Brunel Case. 
We are looking for  any information that could help us in our case and we were told that you represented 
Could we organise a phone call to discuss this further ? 
Best re ards, 
tel +33 1 40 97 84 01 or +33 7 86 
60 97 89 
2llogo police nationale 
CAPITAINE DE POLICE 
Direction centrale de la police judiciaire 
Office Central pour la Repression des Violences aux 
Personnes 
Adjoint du Groupe Central des Mineurs Victimes 
101 rue des Trois Fontanot - 92000 NANTERRE 
EFTA00020913

Tel: 01 40 97 84 01 - Fax : 01 73 92 25 55 - 
Pour une administration 
exemplaire. preservons l'environnement. 
N'imprimons que si necessaire.

error,

computer. [v.1 08201831BSFJ
